Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-26157 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.35.0-17
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-26157 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.35.0-17. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package busybox is earlier than 1.35.0-17, affected by CVE-2026-26157
